players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I think we should consider who might have had a motive to kill Charlie. Bob and Alice have been quiet so far—maybe one of them knows more than they're letting on."
You: "I agree with Diana that we should think about motives. However, staying silent might make us more suspicious. I want to hear from Bob—does he have any thoughts on who could be the mafia?"
Diana: "I think Bob's silence is quite telling. If he were town, he might try to defend himself or point out suspicious behavior. Bob, can you explain why you haven’t spoken yet?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
